<h1 align="center">
 Luxurious-resort
</h1>

## description
Hotel boutique shop  with dummy data build with React.js - Hooks and context API

ps:  need to work on some CSS bugs &  add booking date

    
  user can filter according to 
 	1.	type of room
	2.	price
	3.	numbers of guest
    4. breakfast
    5. pets allowed or not

This project is online: https://react-luxresort.netlify.com.
 
 PS: Thanks to codeaddict on Youtube who inspired me to expand on this project. 

## üßê What's inside?

A quick look at the top-level files and directories you'll see in my React project.



FOLDER STRUCTURE
( ROOT )

index.js
app.js
data.js
ErrorPage.js
Contexts
--- components
    --Global
    --Home
    --Rooms
    --Global
